name: Rolling Disco
description:
This game has been developed for UDO Games NextGenDevs Internship program. It is a mobile hyper-casual game. The aim of the game is throwing people out of the platform in given time. 

Some free assets also used for environment. However,

Game Art is mainly made by Emre Topcu. 

Game Developer Ozan Soylu.

Game Designer/Developer Furkan Vatansever.
